data.persona: I became lost while traveling to the castle market to sell my goods.  I do not often travel away from my small village.  I am afraid that bandits will find and rob me.
data.description:
You are in the Oasis.
An impossible relief from the sweltering heat, the Oasis sounds like the fevered dream of a dying traveler.  A cool, refreshing spring of water surrounded by palm trees is tucked away from prying eyes, with a single tent set up from a traveler long past.  A lost traveler may find themselves there in their time of need, their thirst slaked by the crisp and impossibly cool water.
There's an a single tent and a palm tree here.
The camel and the a traveler long past are here.

You are carrying a moldy bread, a citrus fruit, and an knife, and wearing a Cloak and a hats.

data.short_motivation: I want to knock the a traveler long past unconscious
data.mid_motivation: I hope to escape with his camel and his food today
data.long_motivation: I hope to survive with these as I find my way to my destination in the coming weeks

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
